pullRequest.title: Graphiti methods pull up to VirSat Core - (Task #477)
pullRequest.bodyText:
Pulls up SWTBot Graphiti test methods to Virsat Core's SWTBotTestCase
class.
Closes #477
Task #477: Pull up SWTBot Graphiti Diagram Editor methods

commit.message:
Graphiti methods pull up to VirSat Core - (Task #477)

Pulls up SWTBot Graphiti test methods to Virsat Core's SWTBotTestCase
class.

Task #477: Pull up SWTBot Graphiti Diagram Editor methods

nodes.bodyText: We need some comments here on this method and how it works since it does some crazy reflection stuff.

I am not a 100% sure if we can generalize this so easily.
The "Open Diagram Editor" handler in FDIR is a custom handler.

commit.message:
Resolved comments - (Task #477)

nodes.bodyText: Usually the comments for methods go above the parameter descriptions.
Can we at least use IllegalArgumentException | IllegalAccessException e to make this more compact?

Task #477: Pull up SWTBot Graphiti Diagram Editor methods

nodes.bodyText: At the moment we do not bind versions in Virtual Satellite when possible. please remove the specific version
Maybe refactor string to static member variable in TestCase or UtilityClass.
show error also in log. Log can be accessed via the bundle activators. such as Activator.getLog.log(…)
